author: mxmanghi
msg: Amending naming error. This branch (debian-apache2.4) was meant to be a snapshot of Debian stuff for Apache 2.2. New files and changes for the new packaging scripts made by the debian-apache team are in the usual /debian directory. Renamed as debian-apache2.2

author: dennisl
msg: [DOXIASITETOOLS-71] Add the version of doxia-site-renderer that is used to the generated site
Change the name of the property to better match what it represents.

author: dennisl
msg: [DOXIASITETOOLS-71] Add the version of doxia-site-renderer that is used to the generated site

author: mxmanghi
msg: Changes and new files to package Rivet 2.0.4 with Debian Apache 2.4

msg: commit to rectify error in gora-accumulo-mapping.xml, and also to make gora-accumulo module OSGi ready for consistency with other datastore modules.
